issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
As of now Hyperloop and the Android builder in our SDK both include a check for duplicate .jar files.

[~cwilliams] made a few suggestions in https://github.com/appcelerator/hyperloop.next/pull/129 to optimize this:
- Reuse the same code if possible
- do the check before we run through dexer (and after hyperloop/plugins/hooks may have modified the list of JARs)
fields.summary: Unify .jar dupe detection in Hyperloop and Titanium SDK
